rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space for coats and shoes, oriented towards the main entrance facing east as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with dining space, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall for maximum natural light and ventilation. Natural elements are included for improved air circulation.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A landscaped central courtyard that serves as a private outdoor space fostering connectivity with nature. This aligns with Vastu principles to ensure balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area with sufficient natural light through high windows and proper ventilation. Located away from the living areas for privacy.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the east direction to invite positive energy according to Vastu.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
openings.description: Installed in living area and courtyard for optimal natural light and ventilation.
